disbursementsTreemapAggregation: $apply=<filterString>groupby((grantAgreement/component/componentName,grantAgreement/geographicArea/geographicAreaCode_ISO3,grantAgreement/geographicArea/geographicAreaName),aggregate(TotalDisbursedAmount with sum as disbursed, TotalSignedAmount with sum as signed, TotalCommittedAmount with sum as committed, GrantAgreement/GrantAgreementId with countdistinct as count))
